resources.string:
INFO:(c)JRDVSOFT Abril 2017

The Service(Accesibility) must be enabled before start working.Once clicked please enable de EZGestures Service 

You can choose to see the panel in Black to notice exactly where it is located to make the Gesture easier to understand!!!

Thanks 4 the beer!!!
Forget the physical buttons!
This is faster and more intuitive.
Once used to do it you will never use the physical buttons anymore!!!
(Uninstall DEMO version first!!!)
Fling(swipe up fast and release finger) from bottom to simulate the home Button press!
Simply swipe up and down fast from bottom of the screen to simulate the BACK Key press!

In order to work, you first must enable me as an Accesibility Service running.
Do not worry about battery usage, it is less than 1% at week!
You can take a look , on how we detect the Fling and the Swipe up and down by enable the Panel in Black.
Hope you enjoy it!!!

 (c)JRDVSOFT Abril 2017
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
